short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A sleek and minimalist todo list app, displayed right on your newtab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Look no further for a beautiful, sleek and minimalist todo list new tab page.

TaskTab is a todo list styled with Bootstrap 4 and CSS 3 and developed with Javascript.

Organize your day by adding tasks, flagging important ones with a "#" when adding, and checking them off when done.

Pick from a selection of gradient backgrounds to find your favorite.

*All data stored locally using the Local Storage JS API
